title: Stones River National Battlefield: Fire Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Fire Management              Fire Management          Fire is one of many elements that may contribute to a healthy ecosystem. For more than a century, humans have suppressed fires in many National Park Service areas out of concern for life and property.Stones River National Battlefield uses prescribed fires to allow this natural force to assist us in managing the park's unique cultural and natural resources.Stones River National Battlefield Fire Management Plan
